title: Jatapong

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: @OP when you will make a deal never send the payment first to the newbie, jr member, member, full member, and those who have a negative trust. If you have to send to them then you can use escrow and you can find out the trusted escrow from this list "Few Trusted Escrow Providers."

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on March 06, 2023, 02:17:12 AMLittle scammer offered MinerJones as escrow and made excuses and I told him to do it for BITIFY everyone knows that site and I don't accept it either and then he deleted the chatAre you referring to telegram chat? Never need to rely on telegram chat as scammers can pretend the reputed user and the chat can be deleted. If anyone wants to use the escrow of MinerJones then that is perfect and there is nothing to be worried about that. As MinerJones is the most trusted user in the forum which anyone can see from his profile. At the same time base on your profile, no one should send 5$ first to you. Because there is no guaranty that you will pay for that 5$.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
